Header.title: Welcome.
Header.paragraph: Hi! Im Juan, and this is my portfolio webside

About.paragraph: I am a 25-year-old developer from San Luis, Argentina. I consider myself an adaptable, active, persistent and proactive; someone who focuses on a task and executes it effectively. I adapt easily to teamwork and their goals. I constantly look for continuous growth and to keep increasing my knowledge.
Why: Availability in relocation if this is a requisite

Gallery.title: Web developer course
Gallery.description: App made for test in HTML/CSS course. I learned how to create web pages and web applications using HTML and CSS.

Gallery.title: Bazar Landing
Gallery.description: Landing page created for a e-shop. I used Bootstrap to create a responsive landing page.

Gallery.title: Wheater App
Gallery.technology: HTLM, CSS, JavaScript, Styled Components, React, Redux, Axios, Versel
Gallery.description: Weather app created using React, Redux, Axios, and Styled Components. I used the OpenWeather API to get the weather data.

Gallery.title: Find Movies App
Gallery.technology: HTLM, CSS, JavaScript, Styled Components, React, Redux, Axios, Versel
Gallery.description: Movie finder app I created using React, Redux, Axios, and Styled Components. I used the MovieDB API to get the movie data.

Gallery.title: Web education courses
Gallery.description: Course took in the university. I learned how to create web pages and web applications using HTML and CSS.

Gallery.title: Dog Breed App
Gallery.technology: HTLM, CSS, JavaScript, Styled Components, React, Redux, Axios, Secualize, Postman, Postgres, Heroku, Versel
Gallery.description: Dog breed app created using React, Redux, Axios, and Styled Components. I used the Dog API to get the dog breed data.

Gallery.title: Pioeral Coin
Gallery.technology: HTLM, CSS, JavaScript, Styled Components, React, Redux
Gallery.description: Landing created for a fictitious electronic currency using React, Redux, and Styled Components.

Gallery.title: YourJob
Gallery.technology: HTLM, CSS, JavaScript, Styled Components, React, Redux, PostgreSQL, Heroku, Vercel, Bootstrap, Firebase, Stripe, Socket.io
Gallery.description: A social network for job seekers. Worked with scrum methodology, and realtime database payment.

Services.name: React
Services.text: React is an open source Javascript library designed to create user interfaces with the goal of making it easy to develop single-page applications.

Services.name: JavaScript
Services.text: JavaScript is an interpreted programming language, a dialect of the ECMAScript standard. It is defined as object-oriented, prototype-based, imperative, weakly typed, and dynamic.

Services.name: SQL
Services.text: SQL is a domain-specific language designed to administer and retrieve information from relational database management systems.

Services.name: NodeJS
Services.text: Node.js is an open source, cross-platform runtime environment for the server layer based on the JavaScript programming language.

Services.name: HTML5
Services.text: HTML, short for HyperText Markup Language, refers to the markup language used to create web pages.

Services.name: CSS
Services.text: CSS, in Spanish «Cascading Style Sheets», is a graphic design language to define and create the presentation of a structured document written in a markup language.

Services.name: Figma
Services.text: Figma is a primarily web-based vector graphics editor and prototyping tool, with additional offline features enabled by desktop applications on macOS and Windows.

Services.name: GitHub
Services.text: GitHub is a way to host projects using the Git version control system. It is mainly used for creating source code for computer programs.

Services.name: Styled Components
Services.text: Use the best bits of ES6 and CSS to style your apps without stress.

Services.name: Firebase
Services.text: Is a cloud-hosted, NoSQL database that your Apple, Android, and web apps can access directly via native SDKs

Services.name: Stripe.js
Services.text: Stripe is a suite of APIs powering online payment processing and commerce solutions for internet businesses of all sizes.

Services.name: Bootsrap
Services.text: Bootstrap is a free and open-source toolkit for developing with HTML, CSS, and JS.
